title: pbe acc
body: I create my pbe account, and when i download the launcher, i tried to login while the launcher is paching, and it says its wrong password or username, and i dont know why doesnt this work, can u help me? plss

replies.body: Sorry to hear about that!  I haven't heard of any login issues on PBE currently, but fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help you out with updating your info.
